item.description:
I didn't give much notice the last time, and tried to start it too early. Let's try Wed the 31st at 6:30pm.

This walk is 4.5 miles, but there are T and Bus lines along the way if you want to duck out early.

Here's the proposed map.

We'll meet at Dunks, as usual. It should be east to find a parking spot in the area, and you can take the C (Cleveland Circle) or D (Reservoir) Green lines. There are a few places to eat if people want to do dinner during or after the walk.

Please try to arrive at 6:30, but you are welcome to join the walk late, just call or text me to find out where we are. I try not to wait too long, so if you're going to be late, please call or text me close to 6:30.
item.how_to_find_us: Green jacket, blue jeans, constantly looking around for meetup people.
item.name: Brighton 4.5mi. - Reservoir, Chestnut Hill Ave, & Washington St.
